divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside saw a bright pretty red pulsating light ,i ran in to get my sister n it was still there ,appearing to come closer no sound still then it looked like it was slowly going away then a sudden blink out.when i took my photo on my phone it showed up white. Wierd
